examples.example: 正是因为大家的共同努力，我们才取得了如此优异的成绩。

translate.english: It is precisely because of the joint efforts of everyone that we have achieved such excellent results.

examples.example: 正是阳光明媚的日子，大家一起愉快地出门游玩。

translate.english: It is a sunny day, and everyone goes out to play happily together.

examples.example: 正是老师的辛勤教导，我们才得以茁壮成长。

translate.english: It is the hard teaching of the teacher that we can thrive.
